long_description: This multi-purpose wrist compass is designed with a side-reading window for taking bearings on land or at sea. Liquid-filled compass features a sapphire jeweled bearing for accuracy. May be read from the top or the side; sighting notch and reading window can be used effectively with compass attached to the wrist. Convenient black Velcro(R) wrist strap adjusts to fit a wide range of sizes. Housing turns easily with a ratcheting mechanism for direction setting.
short_description: This multi-purpose wrist compass is designed with a side-reading window for taking bearings on land or at sea.
